title: Missed Opportunites for Merch Store
body:
There's some nice stuff in the new merch store but so many missed opportunities.

• Frejord, frozen - Poro Shaped Ice Cube Molds
• Throw Pillows, preferably Poro shaped
• Wukong Banana Cookies
• Leona’s shield Wall Decor
• Baron Lamp
• Baron paper weight
• Dancing Baron Desk Toy
• Poro Snack/Biscuit Cookie Molds
• Crystaline Flask - Flask
* Elixir Coffee Mugs
• Blood Moon Kabuki Masks
• Transforming Mecha Malaphite/Aatrox Toys
• Dragon statue with clips (so he can roost on top of your monitors)
• Volibear honey
• 1lb Gummi-Zac
• Gragas Barrels
• Women’s Yoga/sweats with VICTORY on the bum
• Yordel collection
• Zilean Clock
• Heimerdinger dancing toy that spins
 
Last but not least, the one item that will sell like hot cakes and net you MILLIONS:

• Teemo Stress/Squeeze Toy/Ball - preferably one where his head gets bigger when you squeeze his body

P.S. Hire me Rito plz ;)

EDIT:

• Summoner's Cups! (or Chalice)

replies.body: 10/10 would attach a dragon statue to my monitor.
IKR? The new model is perfect for it!
As someone who tries to collect all things Heimerdinger, I highly advocate for a Heimer spinning dancing toy. That'd be legit.

Nerf Heimerdinger Water Turrets... please make it happen. I am not good adc so It would be awesome to set some nerf turrets during my nerf wars. But if not possible, I will be just fine with the heimer spinning dancing toy.

Everything heimerdinger related will be highly profitable. I will make it happen. I work in retail so I can help driving sales for any heimerdinger item. {{champion:74}} {{item:2050}}
That username. Forest Gump's long lost cousin =o
Bonus points if the dancing Heimer toy comes with three turrets that can head bob to him dancing spinning on his head!
I'd love some Ziggs bombs miniballs, like Gp's oranges C:

> I'd love some Ziggs bombs miniballs, like Gp's oranges C:

Ziggs stress ball bombs exist, they're usually thrown at events!

Seriously, why don't you sell the Ziggs bomb and Poro stress balls? There is demand for them, you guys refuse to sell them for some reason.
edit: Maybe include on in orders of over a certain amount?
oooomg!!!! I have to get me to one of those events one day I swear ;_;
You mean anti-stress balls, right. RIGHT?
Thresh's lantern lamps would be pretty cool too! :D

A greenish lava lamp that looks like it has souls in it?
Yes please.
Why isn't anyone talking about the lack of Voidling plushies? I **seriously** need one for my girlfriend.
gibe koggles plushi pls

> • Throw Pillows, preferably Poro shaped


I'll take 20.
>I'll take 20.
Lemme just save this and use it all the time ok?{{champion:33}}   Ok.

>• Dragon statue with clips (so he can roost on top of your monitors)

TEN

I NEED TEN OF THESE

can we get anivia too

>• Teemo Stress/Squeeze Toy/Ball - preferably one where his head gets bigger when you squeeze his body

If you make this $15...I'll buy it.

To add to the list: Valor plushies.

Preferably lifesize.

The Demacia hoodie was an instant OMG want for me... then I looked at the price tag and instantly deflated.  Without knowing the functional nature of it (thickness) that's a high price tag for a hoodie.  If it's thick enough to withstand Utah winters, I'd buy in a heartbeat, just can't see it well enough to know that I'm not buying an Old navy "casual" hoodie.

You do realize that it's not a missed opportunity when the store is just starting up? They might not have all the resources to create all of that kind of stuff right off the bat.  Try learning how a company works first.
Still waiting out on LoL based cereals like "Teem-Os" and "Apple Zacs" :P
my kid would absolutely love a riven sword he could swing around
Broken or full sword
{{champion:37}}

Anything {{champion:61}} would be amazing.

Ori ball keychain.
Ori ball plushie!

> • Women’s Yoga/sweats with VICTORY on the bum

and if they do that, they must also have the mirror version. DEFEAT as well.

> EDIT:
> 
> • Summoner's Cups! (or Chalice) 

ooo, I like this one. Like, a normal type cup, but with words on it. Like Demacia, Ionia, or something. or cups with champion names on it. I swear, if they make a cup with Volibear's name/picture on it, I am so getting it. I'll be on the lookout for Volibear related stuff.
YES PLEASE, I WANT SEVERAL OF THESE THINGS.

>• 1lb Gummi-Zac

I want that! Good list, by putting it up there we have more chance of seeing those!
I do believe Riot said this was just starting merchandise and they would add much more along the line.

All of these are great ideas...especially dragon for the monitor..HELL YeS 

But I think you missed a big detail, mainly that the merch store is still beta, so it's not complete, along with the fact that even if it wasn't a beta they could still add all of these things, and more to it whenever they wanted to.
A Noxus hoodie would be pretty awesome, even a Talon one could be awesome.
I was told League of Legends is a free to play game. But I have never spent so much money on a game before. My wallet cries.

> • Heimerdinger dancing toy that spins

Should not it be Orianna?
- {{champion:63}}  new thermo-mug
poro or teemo hacky sacks.
I want my own Karthus Staff...also it'd be cool if you made a disk of the Pentakill album...which had a code for all the Pentakill skins...(with the champs if required of course.)
That album would cost like $45

Please make these happen!

-Leblanc Figure w/ clone.
-Yorick Ghost plushies
-Yorick Lamp... lamp.
-Eggnivia figure, plush.
-Lissandra ult lamp.
-Rengar plush.
-Lee sin Figure.
-Karthus Statue.
-Kha'Zix plush.
-Rek'Sai plush.
---
And for the love of God I need a Kog'Maw plush!
Plus a ride-able, walking Willump... if you've got time.

Thresh Lantern Lamps then.

Draven Bobble heads. always
But what about Scuttle Crab plushies? I guarantee those'd sell even better than the Teemo stress balls :P
Would like gromp over scuttle crab personally
I would just like some coffee mugs personally
True, especially the oversized ones

On that Zilean clock idea it could be a whole line of clocks. Alarm clocks featuring Teemo "Never underestimate the power of the scouts code" Nunu bot " ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha" Leblanc " oh ho ho ho ho ho ho..." Would love to see that alarm clock get made!

Orianna action figures (w/ ball) can come in containers shaped like her E. And her joints won't break character :)

Also: Sinful Succulence Morgana aprons with wings and Bristles plushies. You can't do much with poros if Bristles can't spook them.
It's still pretty awesome that Tibbers plushies available though! Coming from an Annie main. {{champion:1}}

I haven't had a chance to look at the store yet so I am hoping this exists - I will buy a thresh LED lantern as soon as I get home if it exists. I use a lantern to let my dog out and pretend it is thresh lantern when I am bored, but it's not the same damnit! I want the official one!
